title: Need to import multiple .EML file into TB 115.10 using no extension
content: This is second request (can't find the first). I need to import multiple (bookoo) .EML files into TB 115.10 to later move into "folders". Several weeks ago I somehow found someway to import a single .EML file (downloaded from an old ISP) into TB -- and then got busy with other projects -- and now cannot figure how I did it. I did not use an extension (ImportExportTools NG) -- just the native tools in TB 115.10. If anyone is familiar with importing EML files -- sure would appreciate suggestions. Thanks.
creator: druw

title: Passwords on Thunderbird
content:
How can I reset the Master Password for Thunderbird if I never (knowingly) set one?????

I set up Thunderbird a few nights ago and accessed my att.net, gmail.com and icloud accounts with Thunderbird.

Then, tonight, when I tried to access my emails, I get stymied by needing a password for Thunderbird which I am pretty sure I never set up.....

Now, I can't access email on Thunderbird..... FRUSTRATING!!!!

How can I reset my passwords if I can't get into Thunderbird's Master Password list??????

VERY FRUSTRATING!!!!


HELP!!
creator: phlcpa

title: After upgrade Thunderbird to 140.2.0esr 32bit can not send and receive mail
content: After upgrade Thunderbird to 140.2.0esr 32bit can not send and receive mail. When receive - nothing happens. When send - the window "send message" never closed with status "send message". While sending in Windows Task Manager process "Thunderbird" get more CPU. How resolve this issue?

title: Error occurred while saving my message for some of my email accounts
content:
Hi , I 've got a problem with Thunderbird (142.0 32bits) . I 've got this message for some of my a email accounts "An error occurred while saving your messages. Make sure the file system gives you write permissions and that you have enough disk space available to copy the inbox" . I have enough disk space on my computer and I have the write permissions on my thunderbird folders. How to resolve this problem ? (I think the problem occured when I was doing a full backup of my computer with windows microsoft software "robocopy" when Thunderbird was working and receiving emails) Thank you for your help !

Jean
creator: johnny.burwood

title: Display in inbox
content: The number of emails displayed in the inbox on this desktop computer changes without notice or through anything that I do. A short time ago the number displayed dropped from 100 or so to 30. I had also installed Thunderbird on an Acer laptop and that one is currently displaying 1024 emails in the inbox, which I believe would be the total in my bigpond .com mailbox. How do I get Thunderbird on this computer to show the same as the inbox on the laptop? None of the Local folders are displayed on the laptop but are on this desktop. Regards, J.R. Meyland

title: Cannot add security exception after update to TB snap 140.2.0esr (64-bits) - dialog freezes
content:
Hi all, After updating my snap Thunderbird to version 140.2.0esr (64-bit) on a Kubuntu 24.04.03 system, one of my email accounts is no longer able to send emails because the certificate is not recognised.

Adding a security exception always helped (because it concerns my own domain), but now the Thunderbird dialogue box freezes when creating an exception. Even entering the domain directly into security.tls.insecure_fallback_hosts (via about:config) does not result in the server setting I always used before the update being accepted.

Could it be that this component contains a bug? How could I test it? Perhaps someone has some ideas?

Thank you in advance for your input.

Marc
creator: vivideo

title: Copy the sender's email address from a mail does not work under Linux Mint
content:
Hi -

Copying the sender's email address to the clipboard does not work.

I am using Thunderbird 128.14.0esr (64-bit) on Linux Mint 21 Vanessa.

This is what I do:

  1. Open a mail that I received
  2. Right-click or double-click on the sender address (it is highlighted when the mouse hovers above it)
  3. Nothing happens. Expected: a dialogue with a popup menu containing "copy"

Work-around: reply to the message, then copy the email address (which works) and discard the reply.
creator: pieter35
